
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53351308">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 lostlosin 于 2025-7-2 13:50 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
批处理设置DNS，管理员权限运行，“以太网”根据实际更改，win10运行正常<br>
<br>
@echo off<br>
:start<br>
echo 请输入数字选择DNS设置:<br>
echo 1：自动<br>
echo 2：阿里<br>
echo 3：360<br>
echo 4：腾讯<br>
echo 5：114<br>
echo 6：dnspod<br>
echo 7：百度<br>
echo 8：火山<br>
set /P var=":"<br>
if %var%==1 goto auto<br>
if %var%==2 goto ali<br>
if %var%==3 goto 360<br>
if %var%==4 goto tengxun<br>
if %var%==5 goto 114<br>
if %var%==6 goto dnspod<br>
if %var%==7 goto baidu<br>
if %var%==8 goto huoshan<br>
:auto<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip delete dns "以太网" all<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为auto成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:ali<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 223.5.5.5 primary<br>
netsh interface ip add dns name="以太网" 223.6.6.6 index=2<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为阿里成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:360<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 101.226.4.6 primary<br>
netsh interface ip add dns name="以太网" 218.30.118.6 index=2<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为360成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:tengxun<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 119.28.28.28 primary<br>
netsh interface ip add dns name="以太网" 182.254.118.118 index=2<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为腾讯成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:114<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 114.114.114.114 primary<br>
netsh interface ip add dns name="以太网" 114.114.115.115 index=2<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为114成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:dnspod<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 119.29.29.29 primary<br>
netsh interface ip add dns name="以太网" 182.184.2.2 index=2<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为dnspod成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:baidu<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 180.76.76.76 primary<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为百度成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
:huoshan<br>
cls<br>
netsh interface ip set address name="以太网" source=dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" dhcp<br>
netsh interface ip set dns name="以太网" static 180.184.1.1 primary<br>
netsh interface ip add dns name="以太网" 180.184.2.2 index=2<br>
ipconfig /flushdns<br>
echo DNS设置为火山成功<br>
echo ------------------------------------------<br>
goto start<br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
